name: Mutating Man
description:
mutating man is a arcade/shoot-em-up mobile game where you fight waves of enemies while mutating into different monsters every  10 seconds.

This game is based on a mobile game called magic survival and made for the pygame new years jam 2021.

Sounds made with sfxr.

Font is ThaleahFat.

My discord # is LordNissinOficial#5364.

Source code: https://github.com/LordNissinOficial/mutating-warrior
